{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WVC100N |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/31/2009 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=unreleased |type=camera |fcc_id=Q87-WVC100N |ic_id=3839A-WVC100N |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Prolific |cpu1_model=PL1129 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445EMI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9102HEP |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Wireless-N Day/Night Internet Home Monitoring Camera'''
"490YQP00B" is silkscreened on the main board. :"YG300M0A-1.0" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
This would seem to be an unreleased device.
